Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix next hand stack calculation to account for player contributions

Previously, the next hand generator incorrectly calculated ending stacks
by only adding pot winnings to starting stacks, without subtracting the
contributions made during the hand.

Changes:
- Add PlayerContribution interface to track contributions by player name
- Update calculateNewStacks to accept optional playerContributions parameter
- Change formula from: New Stack = Starting Stack + Winnings
  to: New Stack = Starting Stack - Contributions + Winnings
- Update PotCalculationDisplay to aggregate and pass player contributions
  from main pot and all side pots when generating next hand
- Add previousStack and netChange fields to NextHandPlayer for tracking
- Add console logging for debugging stack calculations

This fixes the issue where SB/BB were being double-counted when players
went all-in from blind positions.
